original_title: Adolfo Pérez Esquivel. Otro mundo es posible
overview: A documentary about Adolfo Pérez Esquivel. Peace and justice service. The prison. The mothers of Plaza de Mayo. The Nobel Prize. His commitment to Nicaragua. The external debt. The fight against the Auk. The summit of the peoples. Haiti, long before hypocrisy. Argentina. Youth for peace. Looting and pollution. Latin America. And another world is possible. A documentary about Adolfo Pérez Esquivel. Peace and justice service. The prison. The mothers of Plaza de Mayo. The Nobel Prize. His commitment from him to Nicaragua. The external debt. The fight against the Auk. The summit of the peoples. Haiti, long before hypocrisy. Argentina. Youth for peace. Looting and pollution. Latin America. And another world is possible.
title: Adolfo Pérez Esquivel. Otro mundo es posible
